website_summaries.verdict: The quality of the bedding is great for the price and Comfy Bedding's customer service is unparalleled.
pros: This five piece set has everything you need, including a comforter, two pillowcases, and two throw pillows
You can also upgrade it to an 8 piece set
Customers are thrilled with the rich colors of the bedding
cons: Some complaints about colors not being true to photos but in each case the manufacturer reached out and resolved the issue

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product and it's exactly the color red as it is pictured. The qaulity is spot on! I absolutely love it and ordered the same exact set for another bedroom, you will not be disappointed at all. This company will be getting my business for sure when I need to replace any bedding. I can also vouch for their customer service as that's as important as the product. Within about one hour my question was answered and it was a pleasure doing business with them.
customer_reviews.author: Debby Smith

customer_reviews.title: Get ready to sweat and not have enough side comforter.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the king model and it seems like it's for a California king instead of a standard king. Sides are not long enough and the ends are way too long. Sleeps very hot, this comforter is not breathable and will make you sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Tried to like it, but it's just not working
customer_reviews.text: We got the 5 piece King Grey. It says microfiber but it's definitely a polyester or rayon type material, super shiny and slick not soft at all. We tried washing a few times with fabric softener but it really didn't help much. The only good thing is the pet hair doesn't stick to it. Everything else is a con. Super hot and doesn't breathe well, it's small on the sides... maybe a 1" overlap each side of our standard king bed, it's very shiny and the colors don't look like the picture very much at all. It will work until we find something else we actually like, and then it will become a dog bed or something :p
customer_reviews.author: it's all gone to the dogs

customer_reviews.title: Really like it
customer_reviews.text: Received this bundle on time and I do love it. It's pretty warm under there. The color is vibrant, but not displeasing to the eye. Pillow shams fit perfectly around my thicker queen sized pillows. The only downside for me is that it doesn't feel like it fits properly with my bed length. It's a little short which makes pulling them up annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Lee Love

customer_reviews.title: Sheet is sheer for the warm nights when you still want coverage.
customer_reviews.text: The sheet is sort of sheer and light, which is great if you are a person like me who has to have something covering you even when it's 100 degrees. The pillows are almost better than my expensive pillow even though they are only supposed to be for decoration. The only reason I am deducting a star is because it didn't come with a fitted sheet like you would expect with a set.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: COLOR IS WAY OFF
customer_reviews.text: Color is NOT as pictured at all. It has lots more red in it and is shiny, I almost sent it back. Should have, On the other hand it is a very nice comforter. It is light and quite warm.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Smith

customer_reviews.title: Threading is starting to come loose.
customer_reviews.text: It's very comfortable, but the threading is starting to come undone. In order to return it, costs more than I paid from Korea so I'll have to keep it until I can get another comforter. You get two pillows, pillow cases and a comforter. The problem is after washing it on gentle twice, the threading is already coming undone. I'm had comforters for 10 years that still have no threading issues. I'm very disappointed by this comforter.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomerPerson

customer_reviews.title: This comfoter is beautiful! The picture doesn't do it justice
customer_reviews.text: This comfoter is beautiful! The picture doesn't do it justice. The color is bright and vibrant and the quality of the comforter is supberb. This comforter really is an excellent touch to my son's newly decorated room.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Good looking set! Not much overhang!
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the picture. I ordered the king size, for a king size bed. Not much overhang, so I bought a bedskirt to finish the look. I was very lucky to find one close to the color of the comforter. Very satisfied with the finished look.
customer_reviews.author: CINDY V

customer_reviews.title: If my pug loves it, I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Yassss- I love this set!!! I got the full set which included the coverlet as well. The red pops and the comforter is soft and smooth. Haven’t used the coverlet, but will switch the giant comforter out for it in the spring. Great set and well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Karen V Vincent

customer_reviews.title: On the hotter side, but very soft!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this comforter. Yes, as other reviews say it is indeed a hotter heavyweight comforter, but it is *not* rough on the inside. The outer side is rough-ish but I’m not sleeping with the outside side in contact with my skin so no issues there. The inside is surprisingly soft and it is great for dog hair since it does not stick at all. I have not washed it yet so I can’t say anything about it’s durability, but so far it has been good.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Avoid! Unless you like snuggling sandpaper
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 5-piece set and disappointed is an understatement. First, the “micro-fiber” blanket is a paper thin moving blanket you can purchase from Menards or Home Depot. Second, the comforter and pillow cases feel like a low-grade sandpaper or similar to the texture of those 25+ year old penny uniforms you would wear back in gym class. Lastly, only purchase if you plan to look at this bedroom set from a distance. Any extended contact with pillow cases, “micro-fiber” blanket, and/or comforter will most likely result in some sort of skin irritation (similar to coming into contact with fiberglass). AVOID!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Don’t listen to bad reviews when there’s more good ones :)
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set for my new bed despite the few bad reviews about it falling apart in the washing machine. I washed the comforter on delicate to be safe but because of it’s size I had to run it thru the dryer twice and I used the regular cycle for that and it came out great. The colors are perfect and look exactly like the photo shown. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: This bedding set is soft and comfy! It made my dog look like he is living the life of a royalty. 🐕👑 He even approves this bedding. ✅ The purple color is extremely beautiful and eye catching. It is my favorite color too. Highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Love the quality but the 2nd purchase not as shown
customer_reviews.text: Update: we ended up getting a king sized bed and wanted to get the same type of set but different style... so I ordered the one that has the dark outlines and it looks nothing like the pictures... it's just a light grey with a slightly less light grey... that really wont match the headboard we got for the bed. You can tell quality when you look at something... luckily for us, we can see it, feel it and enjoy it with this set. I wish I would have gotten the whole thing vs just the 5 pieces. I refuse to return it now to get the whole set.... love it too much!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda T

customer_reviews.title: Jacquard Microfiber King Comforter Set
customer_reviews.text: Very nice comforter! I did not give it five stars simply bcuz the top of the comforter is very slick/slippery. Other then that, beautiful! I read some reviews prior to purchasing about how the comforter looked so wrinkled after putting it on the bed. If you take a standard pillow case, place it on top of the comforter, iron on top of the pillow case as you're ironing the comforter in each section it will come out very nice!
customer_reviews.author: ANTO

customer_reviews.title: Love the design and keeps me warm all season long
customer_reviews.text: I really like this comforter set. It was a great price. It keeps you plenty warm and it’s easy to glam it up. I have been eyeing this set for awhile. I’m glad I purchased it. The only thing that was kind of weird was the smell right out the bag. It kind of smelt like BO-or really concentrated sweat. I’ll be heading to the laundromat soon to see if the smell disappears. I’ll comment more later about how it washes up.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. L

customer_reviews.title: Nice comforter.
customer_reviews.text: Love the dramatic color and the texture of it. Feels substantial and well made. It is beautiful and has not been snagged by pets yet a month into ownership. Color seemed true to what I ordered. I did not order it to be a blanket- it feels heavier than some may like. I am very happy with the weight of it.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this comforter! My 8yr old climbed into my bed and gave it the seal of approval as well. It’s not too heavy although it looks like it would be. You may want to wash this at a laundromat that has a decent size washer and dryer as your household one may be too small. The only con is that it is not as wrinkle free as they say it is but I can live with that. The throw pillows are a different material but soft nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Nash

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was more than pleasantly surprised at the quality of this bedding set. Even better, it did not come with an annoying bed skirt which I never use. It does come with throw pillows though and that's something I find lacking about other bedding sets. But truthfully, the quality is the best feature. The comforter is thick, heavy, and well-made. Better quality than I've found just about anywhere. I didn't expect it to be super great; I just needed something to get me through graduate school. However, I can see this set lasting quite a bit longer. Unlike other temporary furniture, fixings, and decor I've purchased for graduate school, this one is coming back home with me after I graduate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thick and Holds Heat
customer_reviews.text: I like that fact that is purple and that it looks elegant. I like that fact the its thick definitely keeps you well heated good for cold nights. I don't like that it has a few pin tucks sewed on top of the comforter keeps it from laying smoothly on the bed. But with everything else so far I'm content with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: She

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking bed sheets. I went with the black queen size and I really like them. I have a long hair cat and a dog and it doesnt attract any hair really. Some would say the top may feel "scratchy" but I like the feeling as it stays cool. The bottom of the comforter is a more soft feeling material. The pillow cases and throw pillows or nice and decent quality. Also got a black furry body pillow to match. Would reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Classy Looking bedding!
customer_reviews.text: Love the looks of this bedding ! So far no issues, however only had them a couple weeks. Only complaint is the over hang on the sides are not long enough, so ordered 2 black twin sheets to sew together so they will hang down past the comforter to give the longer look I wanted like a bed spread.
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: I like it dose the job. I sorta messed up tho thought this came with sheets just saw the 5 piece set and figured it was 2 pillow sheets the comforter and 2 sheets but instead you get 2 little pillows not a big deal just should of read it more before hitting buy but nevertheless I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Blankman

customer_reviews.title: Wrinkles easily.
customer_reviews.text: It only came with two pillows. I like it but I don't love it. If you see in the picture you'll notice how it wrinkles VERY easily. Guess I'll have to insert more stuffing. But the blanket is very loose on top so is the pillow. But it is comfy in my opinion. It's Ok and decent. It doesn't at all look tight and presentable like in the the product picture or come with alot of pillows which by the way I wasn't looking for so I'm quite happy with just the two they shipped to me.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely AWESOME deal
customer_reviews.text: I honestly thought this was a pricing error when I saw the comforter for so cheap in Amazon warehouse! Item is very nice and comfortable. Thank you so much for the great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Rob in FL

customer_reviews.title: I really like this comforter set
customer_reviews.text: This is as described and fits my Cal King bed very well. It is very soft and cuddly but I do find it a little warm even when I turn my thermostat to 67. I turned it a little lower and everything is fine. I love the color and it matches what I saw online. My puppy likes it too and cuddled into it as soon as I put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Susie

customer_reviews.title: Nope...dont buy it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely NOT WRINKLE FREE! there is no way to get the wrinkles out of this comforter. I even spent 60 bucks taking it to a dry cleaners and they couldn't get the wrinkles out. It's a nice spread and great shams and pillows but dont expect it to ever lay flat. Ever.
customer_reviews.author: K B

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for a great price
customer_reviews.text: The item is beautiful and fit our bed perfectly. This is the first order we have received for a Cailfornia King that is the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Probasco

customer_reviews.title: Without question worth the price I paid.
customer_reviews.text: Good looking set, light weight but warm, comfortable, fits the bed appropriately.
customer_reviews.author: B. Smetzer

customer_reviews.title: 8 piece comfoeter set
customer_reviews.text: This 8 piece comforter set is awesome it's right on the color is plum/purple. And it matches my purple sheet set it's awesome I totally recommend this it's a queen size. Five star's.
customer_reviews.author: BRD35

customer_reviews.title: Correct Packaging.  Wrong Product.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product but received this instead: Comfy Bedding Double Needle Durable Stitching 3-Piece Pinch Pleat Comforter Set All Season Pintuck Style King Plum It was sent in the packaging for the correct 5 piece set, but it in fact contained the other 3 piece set. My wife, unaware of which product I had ordered, was very happy with this purple comforter and washed it and placed it on our bed. The only real downside was the $22 price difference. Oh well... One mark against quality control and accuracy. (Although the quality seems pretty good.)
customer_reviews.author: Kuncel

customer_reviews.title: Looks and Feels Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Looks a little cheap. Top material not not comfortable - kind of scratchy. It's more shiny than the picture shows. Had I saw/felt it at a store I would not have purchased. I saw a review about wrinkles and thought "who cares?" but now I get it. The top material is very wrinkled and I think that also makes it look cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Decent bed set. Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like the set. I bought the 5 pc in black and put a pillow case over one of the throws. The set is in the wash now so I’ll know more once it comes out. The wrinkling wasn’t awful taking it out of the packaging so I’m hoping it holds up as such. Overall- decent for the money. One of the only bed sets I’ve purchased that didn’t come ripped.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Oldehoff

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set, I was worried at first about the ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set, I was worried at first about the color of the bedspread after viewing some of the other reviews, but this was just perfect! Would definitely purchase from Comfy Bedding again; the name fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey E.

customer_reviews.title: Great medium-weight comforter
customer_reviews.text: Coming out of the summer, we wanted to replace our bed covering (a light quilt) with something that provided more warmth going into the colder months. The color and design of the plum comforter was just what we were looking for. The darker rectangles make it really stand out. Appearance matches the advertised color, weight is just perfect, and quality is solid. It offers the mix of softness, warmth, and appearance we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Adams

customer_reviews.title: Seemingly can not be machine dried
customer_reviews.text: This product would be fine, fit my redesign of my room nicely. But the first time I washed and dried it, on the lowest heat settings on my machines, I noticed it melted a little so a part of it wrinkled a ton. Kind of a bummer haven't even put it on my bed yet and its basically already ruined. The second time I attempted to wash i completely melted part of it and now I'm going to just have to go buy a new set entirely. Honestly you could get a more durable set for half the price, which is a shame because it did fit really well.
customer_reviews.author: Drew H

customer_reviews.title: The comforter that keeps you warm
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful comforter This blanket would be wonderful in cold places because it sure Conserves your body heat. I live in the south where it is quite hot and cannot sleep without covers. I used to have just a duvet cover now I have this comforter, with the duvet cover I woke up fine, with this comforter I wake up sweating it is efficient in keeping you warm. Know if you want to stay warm you would give this five stars but I don’t need to say that warm is the only reason I’m giving this 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I loved the bedding the fabric is super comfortable I was afraid to buy it for the reviews but it is what I was looking for highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: jazmin

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I’m extremely satisfied with the quality of the bed set. The sheets are soft and slick just how I like them. I’m not a fan of the different sized throw pillows but that’s no big deal. I just would have preferred the comforter to be a flat red instead of a shiny red. Other than that, it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Secret

customer_reviews.title: This was a deal for how NICE this bedding looks!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bedding. It looks expensive though it is very affordable. Perfect amount of thickness for all seasons. Beautiful pattern- the stitching looks great, no frays. Does NOT look cheap. I was very happy with this product. We have had the bedding for a year now and it still looks great. Comes with two decorative pillows. Fits in a washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Zoë Potter

customer_reviews.title: Grey Bed, Grey Bed, What Do You See?
customer_reviews.text: The bedding, while it is comfy, it is not the color I expected. I saw a lovely 2-toned grey comforter that would have been perfect with our decor. What I got was an optical illusion comforter. It appears all very dark grey or, in just the right light, very dark and not-quite-so-dark grey. There is definitely no light grey, as shown in the picture, under any light. If you enjoy an optical illusion and don’t care if your comforter matches your decor, then this is for you. If not... keep shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: In Love
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for a new comforter for a while. Tried two before I ordered this one and I didn't like the color because they were two light. My bedroom is dark grey so i wanted something dark. I received my comforter last night! I ordered the 8 piece set! I was a little worried that I may not like it with looking at the pictures but I am in love with it! Looks great in my room and ties in with my dark grey walls.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this bedding. I was hesitant to buy because I’m generally kind of cheap with bedding but I have no regrets. I love the colors, it doesn’t wrinkle crazy like my last set, and it’s super soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Good bedding - best customer service
customer_reviews.text: This bedding looks and feels great, but I’m even more impressed with the company, Comfy Bedding - some of the BEST customer service ever! After an error (on my part) inputting the address, my package was obviously delivered to the wrong place. The company was so helpful locating where it had gone and sending another one out to me (to the correct address).
customer_reviews.author: Laura A Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Wrinkled bedspread
customer_reviews.text: We really like the bed set. The biggest challenge we have is not being able to get the wrinkles out of the bedspread. I have tried everything including taking it to the laundry mat to put it in a commercial washer and dryer. If you have any further suggestions I would greatly appreciate it. Very frustrating to have such a great looking spread with wrinkles that will not come out.
customer_reviews.author: Katie E.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Super comfy, and it looks great with my colors. I used this as my main item to build my room around. It’s a wee bit darker then the picture, but I was aware that could happen. That is why I choose this as my main center for the my paint color picking.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Not Microfiber
customer_reviews.text: Although this is a relatively nice comforter, it is definitely not microfiber. Feels more rayon/polyester and is quite slippery/shiny. Not quite what I was expecting. It’s also a lot less “plush” than it appears in the pictures. I’ll probably return.
customer_reviews.author: Tyisha

customer_reviews.title: great look
customer_reviews.text: It looks great and isn't too hot. I have bought a few cheaper ones in the past, but this one is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: R. Long

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bedding.  I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: The comforter/bedspread is a beautiful color and is true to the color in the photo. It seems to be well made and is attractive. I would have given 5 *'s but it seems to be a little small for a queen and the darker rectangles are not as shiny as in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: consumer crank

customer_reviews.title: Quality bed set.
customer_reviews.text: Thick and stylish. Love the look and thickness of these bed set. The quality is spot on and fits my queen sized bed perfectly. Would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley B

customer_reviews.title: Shiny and Heavy
customer_reviews.text: It came exactly as described. We got the black. It is very shiny and on the heavy side. It ended up not matching our other furniture so it was an easy refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful in Grey
customer_reviews.text: Since I haven’t gotten it out and started using it yet I can’t officially say a whole lot about it. What I can say is that the gray is much better in person than what it shows in the picture. Quality appears very nice and shipping was fast.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Love the red!
customer_reviews.text: Great color! Perfect for for a queen size bed. The throw pillows included are very nice. Interesting pattern.. Gives a high end look.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice set
customer_reviews.text: The set is really complete. The quilt can be layered under the comforter on really cold nights. I bought this for my grandson who wanted to change his decor to navy blue. We all really liked it. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because you can’t get matching window coverings.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia P.

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased by the quality and the brightness of color. The color is just like in the picture. I am very pleased with this purchase. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: loren

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful bedding set! Exactly as pictured and even comes with a thin quilted HUGE blanket so you can roll comforter down. Love the pattern and silky feel of comforter. Nicely packaged and great purchase for your money!
customer_reviews.author: J Rebel

customer_reviews.title: Great seller, great set
customer_reviews.text: Originally ordered the queen black 5 price was was sent the wrong set and color. After contacting the seller, a replacement set was immediately sent and was correct this time. Great set, looks good, really makes the bed and bedroom look good. Kind of hot, but I am always hot and my wife is always cold, so it works for us. Will possibly buy for my guest bed and my son's.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Foster

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but terrible!
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is very terrible to sleep with. Your skin won’t be able to breathe under it. Doesn’t matter how cold it is in your room, you’ll wake up soaked in your own sweat. It looks good and that’s where it ends at. I don’t use it again and I just got it.
customer_reviews.author: Sunkanmi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful comforter! It works very well in my room
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful comforter! It works very well in my room. Even my husband loves this comforter. He says it makes our bed feel like a high end hotel bed.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Buy this comforter!! You wont be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: Better than the pictures!! The design in the comforter is amazing. It has completley changed the look of my room!! The accent pillows are really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Worthy Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I love the texture I was worried it would be too silky and snag easily however that was not the case it’s lightweight but heavy duty. Perfect for summer/winter (I live in Colorado) and adds just the right amount of decor to any bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm but very wrinkly :/
customer_reviews.text: I want to like this. I really do. It looks great and is well made. I used it once at night and it is very warm and cozy. The problem with it is the wrinkling. I washed it per instructions in my front load washer, dried it on low in my front load dryer, and laid it out on my bed. Wrinkles everywhere. So much it does not look good at all on the bed. I do not want to return it, but I may have to.
customer_reviews.author: Lightspace Media

customer_reviews.title: Love this.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE!!! The purple matches the room!!! And we are both hot sleepers, this is light enough to keep us from sweating but not so light that we get cold. So happy :) I got the 5 peice but I regret it I should’ve gotten the 8 peice. I wasn’t expecting such good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Bedding
customer_reviews.text: I thought the Bedding was Very Nice and for the Price I thinks its Good Quality and I like the weight of the bedding. The reason I gave it a 3 on Wrinkles is because it does come out with wrinkles out of the packaging not sure how to get rid of them? I'm hoping over time they will fade away.
customer_reviews.author: David Wendt

customer_reviews.title: Royal
customer_reviews.text: Cause purple is the color of royalty and that is as close as I will get with my broke self
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Nice understated pattern, soft material.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice- it looks great on our King bed. I like the subtle pattern on both comforter and coverlet, especially. The material is soft and the coverlet lies flat.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the gray set. The set seems nice, but the bedding looks mostly gray with a subtle design. It looks like it has black accents in the picture, but it has more of darker gray accents with different lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Noah Simondet

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Love the plum color. I washed it initially after I received it and didn't have any issues with tearing or color fading.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Shiree

customer_reviews.title: elegant look
customer_reviews.text: Both my husband and I love the look of this comforter, nice clean lines, light weight, elegant. However it does't breath well and even though it is light weight it causes us to sweat a lot! And that’ saying a lot for me as I’m always cold. So, half way through the night we end up throwing it off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylin in grey
customer_reviews.text: Definitely thrilled with my new bedroom look and this bedsheet and comforter set help pull it all together. Alot of bang for my buck.
customer_reviews.author: Rhinox Prime

customer_reviews.title: ... recieved my new comforter and I must say I love it, feels like a quality comforter also looks ...
customer_reviews.text: Just recieved my new comforter and I must say I love it, feels like a quality comforter also looks nice on the bed comes with 2 small pillows and 2 pillowcases, bought the sheet set that they recommended wanted to get the queen set but got the cali queen by mistake and I like the way the cali queen fits on the bed..sry about the broken headrest. Overall I am completely satisfied with this product... hope I'm still satisfied after I wash it.. would buy again in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle  Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Quality at a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: This set looks, feels and fits great! Adds to the whole look of the bedroom,,,
customer_reviews.author: BillJ

customer_reviews.title: Replaced another one with this one
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, well made, warm, cozy, deep rich colors. Love it. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: SRM

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty good. Comfy
customer_reviews.text: No problems except for pillow cases. I personally do not like how it unfolds in the middle with pillow in it. Moving around at night this happens.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ♥️♥️♥️
customer_reviews.text: Was only wrinkled because of shipping, but I absolutely love it. Extremely comfortable and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Bland Jr

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed spread
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on the bed. Soft and nice. Like the style and color.
customer_reviews.author: thomas hartung

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: For a 5-piece set, this is disappointing. I tried reading reviews to find out what is included and if the quality is acceptable, but those weren’t helpful. There are no bed sheets with this product, and it doesn’t cover my whole bed. I did get two little, low-quality pillows instead. Poor product description. Not at all what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought a brand new king mattress and didn’t want to spend a fortune on a bed set. This one is perfect. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: D.W.

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Light
customer_reviews.text: The Comforter is very warm and light. I am happy with how fast the Bed warms up after we go to bed for the evening. Plus it's a lot lighter then or old set.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Kempkers

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this comforter. We got the red! Also, love the softness of the inside.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Really gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I just wish they would sell the black pillow shams seperated so we could buy more when they are in stock. This is not an easy fabric to keep wrinkle free but it's so gorgrouse I don't care. It's super comfy and just feel luxe.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Morgan-Littrell

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad purchase
customer_reviews.text: Over all it's a good comforter, colors in the picture are slightly different than actual. But does its job as intended
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase! Good quality. I tell you what, that comforter gets you WARM! Must be whatever it’s stuffed with but it’s perfect for winter. Having a bedsheet under the comforter will help better regulate the heat (bedsheet not included). My *favorite* part about this purchase was that IT CAME WITH THE “QUILT!!” Absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sandie

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was longer and wider
customer_reviews.text: Love it but wish it was a bigger California King because my mattress topper is thick but otherwise I like it
customer_reviews.author: Jacie

customer_reviews.title: A Great Comforter
customer_reviews.text: Color is a little different than the picture but I love it. It is a great comforter, traps heat extremely well and will make you sweat.
customer_reviews.author: angelsbreath

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Really love this bedding set. Very comfortable and great quality. Also got in in black for our son’s room. It shimmers in the light, dries quickly in the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Scott R Vance

customer_reviews.title: Great product...just as described
customer_reviews.text: I am soooo IN LOVE with this Purple/Plum Comforter! It is in fact lightweight...yet is is sooo soft and warm and comfortable and luxurious and warm! Best comforter o have purchased
customer_reviews.author: Mike and Heather Holland

customer_reviews.title: High quality bedspread
customer_reviews.text: I have a queen size bed and ordered a king. It fit perfect. High quality and soft material. A vibrate red color just as pictured. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star
customer_reviews.text: 5 star product. Was skeptical at first due to some of the reviews, however it came in excellent condition. Strong bright, bold black color with no odor, nor any rips and tears. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: A happy surprised customer!
customer_reviews.text: I was happily surprised at the accuracy of the online picture to the product (I have had to return too many products due to this problem) - it looks great on the bed in my guest room and really pulls the decor together. The price was reasonable,the quality appears very good (the wear not tested yet), it is machine washable, what more can you ask for?.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra M.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described and fast shipping! Very comfortable and my son loves it. Fits bed as described. I wouldn’t describe it as “lightweight” although I guess that could be somewhat subjective. It’s actually pretty heavy and very soft. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: NAS

customer_reviews.title: Getting what I order
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised that it looks nothing like the picture. I order the grey and its 3 shades lighter than what the picture shows. I'll be returning the product.
customer_reviews.author: max

customer_reviews.title: Great Comforter!
customer_reviews.text: I love this comforter! It is really soft and comfortable. I love the color. Comfortable stays pretty wrinkle free and is light weight, it is not heavy. It keeps me warm but not too hot.
customer_reviews.author: Jamal

customer_reviews.title: Good quality , not cheap
customer_reviews.text: Love the bright red color , very comfortable , Good quality !!!
customer_reviews.author: carole west

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new comforter! It is warm but not too warm. The top looks nice, a little shinier than I expected. The bottom is soft and nice to snuggle up to. Pillows and shams were a bonus that I wouldn't necessarily need or use but you never know.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Teche

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Overall very happy with the purchase. We’ve had it for a few weeks now, it’s very comfortable and warm. I run on the hot side so it is a little too warm for me, but my fiancé is always cold and typically needs multiple layers. With this set she just needs the comforter. I do wish it came with matching sheets
customer_reviews.author: Mhuntere

customer_reviews.title: 😁
customer_reviews.text: I love this comforter. It fits nicely and looks so good. The red color is very vibrant.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle B.

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great investment. You’ll love it
customer_reviews.text: This set is awesome. It’s cozy, comfortable and looks amazing. It’s also very warm. I initially didn’t think it would because it’s light weight, but I was very wrong. If you decide to buy it. You’ll be making a great investment! ENJOY
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I got the gray and it looks great, exactly like the picture
customer_reviews.text: I got the gray and it looks great, exactly like the picture. It is incredibly comfortable. It also washes and dries just fine. My only complaint is it is a bit pricey compared to similar products, however in my opinion it looks better and is more comfortable so it is worth the difference.
customer_reviews.author: GamerGuy

product_meta.title: Comfy Bedding Frame Jacquard Microfiber Queen 5-piece Comforter Set, Plum
product_meta.description: Size:Queen 5-piece| Color:PlumThis comforter set matches new modern embossed Frame 3-piece Coverlet Set. Elaborate quilting is controlled by computer to eliminate the trouble of lint as well as to avoid filling shifting or going out. 100% soft microfiber is filled in the comforter for hypoallergenic as well as softness. The comforter is highly durable and easy to wash and dry.
feature_bullets: 1 QUEEN size comforter 90" x 92", 2 STANDARD pillow cases 20" x 26", 1 Square Throw Pillow 12" x 18" & 1 Rectangle Throw Pillow 18" x 18"
Jacquard fabric is weaved to express varied brightness and pattern effects
100% soft microfiber cover and filling for hypoallergenic as well as softness
Deluxe design with masculine and modern flair
Matching Wireless Thermal Pressing Quilted 3-Piece Coverlet Set is available in 8-piece set

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,781 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
